name: IMAGING_DATA
label: Imaging data
definition: Y/N if imaging data are collected from the participants in the sample collection/study

name: NATIONAL_REGISTRIES
label: National registries
definition: Y/N if register data is associated to the participants in the sample collection/study

name: DiseaseDuration
label: Data on disease duration and disease outcome

name: SURVEY_DATA
label: Survey data
definition: Y/N if information from surveys are collected from the participants in the sample collection/study

name: CT
label: CT imaging of lungs, alternatively Xray

name: PHYSIOLOGICAL_BIOCHEMICAL_MEASUREMENTS
label: Physiological/Biochemical measurements
definition: Y/N if Measurements/tests performed during a clinical/home visit and from samples taken from donor

name: GENEALOGICAL_RECORDS
label: Genealogical records
definition: Y/N if genealogical records are associated with the participants in the sample collection/study

name: MEDICAL_RECORDS
label: Medical records
definition: Y/N if medical records are collected from the participants in the sample collection/study

name: BIOLOGICAL_SAMPLES
label: Biological samples
definition: Y/N if biological samples are collected from the participants in the sample collection/study

name: BLOOD
label: Blood count and other lab results especially at the moment of hospital admission
